message.body: Can I come get the van in the morning to pick up that security door
We need to get the auger and fence materials as well. What time are you getting the door?
Around 830. Maybe I can leave it there and pick it up next week instead
Ok well let's get that and the auger if possible so that the holes can get started. I can then run and getting fencing stuff while you mark the holes for Adam.
If I am starting work tomorrow I need to make stakes, get string, ground marking paint. I can do that first thing. Can you pick me up with the van so I can load my tools and supplies around 9
Btw, don't go upstairs in the house or dog will thrash you. Basement is fine though.
If you run out of stuff to do, we need to figure how much concrete and pick it up from PBM
Ok. Can you guys pick up. I'm on my way back. 20 min out.
